aside.div: Add an experimental feature for debugging input and output streams. One can set debugging fields with khttp_parsex(3) or khttp_fcgi_initx(3) and have request reads or response writes logged to standard output. Note: this changes the system API, so make sure any systems calling the above functions are upgraded to account for the extra argument! Also merged a thorough documentation patch by Svyatoslav Mishyn—thanks!
